item.title: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ Canada has released its Consumer Price Index (CPI) for November. On a month-over-month basis, the...
item.description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ Canada has released its Consumer Price Index (CPI) for November. On a month-over-month basis, the CPI increased by 0.1%, in line with expectations and a decrease from the previous month's rise of 0.2%. Year-over-year, the CPI is at 2.2%, slightly below the expected 2.3% and consistent with the previous reading. The core CPI remains unchanged at 2.9%, matching both forecasts and earlier data.

item.title: âš ï¸ Ukraine has rejected Witkoff's suggestion to pull back troops from Donbas during the discussions ...
item.description: âš ï¸ Ukraine has rejected Witkoff's suggestion to pull back troops from Donbas during the discussions in Berlin. The country maintains that a ceasefire can only be achieved without any prior territorial concessions to Russia, agreeing to a pullback only along the frontline. No concrete results from today's negotiations have been announced, and territorial matters continue to be contentious. Official statements regarding the outcomes of the talks are still pending. â€” AFP max

item.title: ğŸ’¥ In 2025, Mantle reached unprecedented milestones, reinforcing its network and market standing. The...
item.description: ğŸ’¥ In 2025, Mantle reached unprecedented milestones, reinforcing its network and market standing. The MNT token climbed into the top 30 on both CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko. The treasury exceeded $7.9 billion, boasting $2.2 billion in total value locked (TVL) and $750 million in circulating stablecoins. The community expanded to over 1 million members and partnered with more than 200 ecosystem collaborators. Mantle emerged as the largest ZK-rollup by TVL and was the first to incorporate EigenDA. Additionally, MNT was listed on major exchanges, including Coinbase. For the complete details, read the full report.

item.description: âš ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ In a joint press conference with Scholz, following discussions between Washington and Kyiv, Zelensky characterized territorial matters as a sensitive topic. Although the tone was optimistic, it appears that Ukraine and the U.S. are still quite distant from reaching a comprehensive agreement. A journalist from The Guardian noted that the primary point of contention revolves around territorial issues, as indicated by conversations with U.S. officials.

item.title: ğŸŒ A summit focused on "protection from Russia" is set to take place in Helsinki with seven EU countr...
item.description: ğŸŒ A summit focused on "protection from Russia" is set to take place in Helsinki with seven EU countries participating. The Bank of Canada will restart its purchases of treasury bills. Several PMI reports are anticipated from Australia, Japan, India, Germany, the Eurozone, the UK, and the US. Germany and the Eurozone will also publish ZEW Economic Sentiment data. Additionally, the US will provide updates on employment, housing, and oil inventories. In Russia, Bank "Saint Petersburg" and Henderson will release their financial reports.

item.description: European leaders and President Zelensky will convene in The Hague on December 16 to form an International Commission aimed at addressing Kyiv's compensation claims against Moscow, which total hundreds of billions of dollars, according to RTRS.

item.title: âš ï¸ According to Starmer, the "Coalition of the Willing" has developed plans for troop deployment in ...
item.description: âš ï¸ According to Starmer, the "Coalition of the Willing" has developed plans for troop deployment in Ukraine if needed. Tusk has stated that Poland will not take part in any multinational forces within Ukraine. Trump mentions that the US and Europe are collaborating on security guarantees to avert the resurgence of war. Politico reports that the US is asking Ukraine to relinquish certain territories in return for these security guarantees. Meanwhile, Zelensky asserts that Ukraine does not recognize Donbass as Russian, either de jure or de facto. max

item.title: ğŸ“Š A December survey conducted by Bank of America among global managers reveals that cash levels in p...
item.description: ğŸ“Š A December survey conducted by Bank of America among global managers reveals that cash levels in portfolios have hit a record low of 3.3%, coinciding with the highest allocation to risky assets. Investments in stocks and commodities are at their peak since February 2022. The Bull & Bear indicator has risen to 7.9, approaching a sell signal. Long positions in the "magnificent seven" stocks continue to be the favored trade, while concerns about the "AI bubble" are viewed as the primary market risk.

item.title: â—ï¸âš ï¸ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡ª Trump has designated Venezuela's current government as a foreign terrorist organization, alle...
item.description: â—ï¸âš ï¸ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡ª Trump has designated Venezuela's current government as a foreign terrorist organization, alleging that the nation has "stolen American assets," such as oil and land. He has implemented a complete blockade on sanctioned oil tankers entering and leaving Venezuela, insisting that these assets must be returned to the U.S. without delay. In response, Maduro has alleged that the U.S. intends to use anti-drug cartel operations as a cover for regime change and the appropriation of resources.
